title: Ticket #1649: WantParallelSchedulingGroup should have a rank option
description: Currently, the dedicated scheduler can restrict parallel jobs to running on one of a set of machines, using the WantParallelSchedulingGroups feature. This is useful if all nodes of a parallel jobs must run within one infiniband switch. Currently, this is a hard requirement. Some users have requested that this be optionally made a rank. That is, if a job can run within a group of machines, it should be scheduled that it, but if not, the dedicated schedule should find some group of machines that match.
